title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 140.2 - Annual report of services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 140.2 - Annual report of services

State Regulations

On or before June 30th of each school year each county
vocational education and extension board shall file with the Commissioner of

Education a report covering the educational services rendered during the school
year, such report to include: (a) a
financial report on forms to be provided by the commissioner; and
(b) a descriptive summary of the educational
services rendered, including pupil attendance in each class, educational
services rendered, records of surveys made, needs of the program with reference
to adequate teaching facilities, transportation, additional services, financial
resources and the like. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
140.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
